SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.renderer

Class Img

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.renderer.Img
public class Img extends Object
Img class using Singleton pattern to load and cache images. The drawing functionality from RenderImg has been merged here for simplicities sake. as the main reason for RenderImg was to initlize everything on startup
